308c0187-8dbb-4d9b-9672-ec3e4261d973.description: Delivered in collaboration with the University of Chester, the Mini MBA Accelerator utilises key strategic and contemporary management ideas and techniques, which are fused with exemplary practice from the private and public sectors. The result is an innovative programme that encourages delegates to apply the best in management thinking to live challenges in their organisation

The course will look at building brands and marketing strategies, digital marketing acquisition, conversion and retention, social media strategies, and much more.
1feabaf9-0c71-4a7d-89b6-e4736b8081e4.name: Digital Marketing and Social Media Course

7d585175-149f-44f5-a2cd-325399f14949.description: The CMI Level 7 Coaching and Mentoring Development Programme reflects current practice in coaching and mentoring, focusing on the role in leading the organisation and managing for success. This course is designed for leaders who have the responsibility for developing and implementing a coaching strategy across the organisation and enhance their own personal competency
7d585175-149f-44f5-a2cd-325399f14949.name: Leadership Coaching and Mentoring Development Programme – CMI Level 7

015919cb-0ac4-4298-9748-3ba4ad7fb0d0.description: The course focuses on individual self-awareness and the emotional response to a range of work-based scenarios, and the effect this has on the decision-making process. A range of theories will be used to expand and challenge pre-conceptions of current leadership practices. On the course, you will develop the key behaviours, attributes and skills of successful leaders and build their own levels of confidence in these areas.
015919cb-0ac4-4298-9748-3ba4ad7fb0d0.name: Leadership and Management Course - CMI Level 5

badge_template_activities.title: The participant will have attended a 3 day programme and have the option of taking the accredited route and obtain a Level 5 qualification.

e6cae726-647d-404e-bef1-df1ace94fe3e.description: The aim of this training is to enable senior leaders to develop an understanding of equality, diversity, and inclusion at a strategic level, and identify how to best integrate key objectives into the organisation. Leaders have the opportunity to critically assess structural inequality within an organisational and societal context, discuss approaches to comply with legal and good practice requirements, and to appraise the influence of equality, diversity, and inclusion on strategic objectives.
e6cae726-647d-404e-bef1-df1ace94fe3e.name: Strategic Approaches to Equality, Diversity and Inclusion Programme - CMI Level 7

The training will enable leaders to develop strategic priorities for equality, diversity, and inclusion, develop change plans to integrate strategy into the culture of the organisation, and evaluate the outcomes financially and socially.

37111ba7-a025-473b-8aea-dd028718c68b.description: The Finance for Non-Finance Directors course equips all Director's so they can recognise and be confident with key financial concepts, terminology and reports that provide insight in to the financial position of any organisation. It also focuses on both your organisational and personal impact as a leader and manager.
8fed79eb-9cae-4744-a54c-fec8e8b0553f.name: Advanced Change Leadership Programme

badge_template_activities.title: If you decide to undertake the Advanced Management Programme on an accredited basis, you will receive a PGCert in Management and Leadership from the University of East London, upon completion.  The PGCert is an additional cost of £2,000+vat. bb5b55d4-7709-4491-a79f-3187832a106a.description: In Professional Development's CMI Level 7 Digital Leadership Programme is designed to help leaders adapt to the challenges of a fast-paced digital environment. It will equip leaders with the skills needed to lead themselves, then translate that knowledge into leading others and forming effective team collaboration. Through attendance on this course, delegates will become digitally informed, empowered leaders and know how to prepare and help their organisation further technology driven change.
bb5b55d4-7709-4491-a79f-3187832a106a.name: Digital Leadership Programme - CMI Level 7

badge_template_activities.title: Attended In Professional Development's course in Digital Leadership, recognised by CMI.

Our people are our greatest asset, and it is inherent upon leaders to take good care of them. The impact of Covid, and associated changes to working patterns, job roles, and in many instances, job security, has produced a once-in-a-generation level of challenge for leaders and managers, who have to balance the needs of the organisation with the psychological wellbeing of their team.
b1885f04-79c9-4adc-a09c-1a5edf8b7428.name: Strategic Approaches to Wellbeing and Resilience Programme – CMI level 7

624ab5cb-89cb-4dbe-93cb-5d5257750146.description: This programme reflects current practice, focusing on what effective coaching and mentoring looks like and drawing links to the achievement of goals. The programme is highly self-reflective and will help individuals develop a better understanding of their own strengths, weaknesses and the influence they can have on others. Participants will gain an insight into their role in building a performance focused culture and how to maximise internal resources to build high performing teams.
624ab5cb-89cb-4dbe-93cb-5d5257750146.name: Management Coaching and Mentoring Development Course- CMI Level 5

ced91531-d82d-42f1-9a41-0b00c5fe8416.description: Agile management provides a pragmatic, dynamic and simple way to lead people and projects. Originally developed by leading edge software companies, the Agile approach has been identified as the most effective method of leading people and projects in today’s complex and competitive environment. This pragmatic and application focused programme, designed for ‘real world projects’ will enable organisational Leaders to become truly Agile in how they work and approach projects and programmes.
ced91531-d82d-42f1-9a41-0b00c5fe8416.name: Agile Project Leadership Programme

badge_template_activities.title: The Agile Project Leadership Programme will focus on the following sessions. Session 1 - Understanding the Agile Approach to Managing Projects. d980d67e-ef53-4435-ba20-111ae51f08f7.description: In any competitive environment, the ability of sales leaders of an organisation to manage complex challenges and environments, will determine its ongoing success. To thrive and grow, sales leaders need to think and act differently as circumstances dictate and take their people with them. Through a combination of strategic, high-performance, self-aware leadership and transformative sessions, it will provide tools to enhance their performance and decision-making skills.
d980d67e-ef53-4435-ba20-111ae51f08f7.name: Advanced Sales Leadership Course - CMI Level 7

badge_template_activities.title: This qualification is designed for managers who have the authority and personal inspiration to translate organisational strategy into effective operational performance. You will be required to take the theory, thought leadership and research discussed on the programme, and implement it in your professional life. This is 4 days long.

f7ce3de4-2e15-4111-9809-884cae47bd0f.description: The Role of the Director and the Board module will give delegates an essential understanding of the key duties, roles and legal obligations of the Director and the Board. f7ce3de4-2e15-4111-9809-884cae47bd0f.name: DDP Module, The Role of the Director and The Board

badge_template_activities.title: Whether you are an experienced long serving Director, newly appointed or an aspiring Director, this course will give you a fresh and unique insight in to an ever growing role and responsibilities accompanying the position.

b5c98aa7-4e32-4527-9de9-b6d32472ff76.description: In any competitive environment, the ability of sales managers or team leaders of an organisation to manage effectively, will ultimately determine its ongoing success. b5c98aa7-4e32-4527-9de9-b6d32472ff76.name: Sales Leadership and Management Programme - CMI Level 5

skills.name: Approaches To Innovation And Considering New Technologies

81fc1a9c-4420-4c21-a5dc-982af22a66bf.description: The term CIO, or Chief Information Officer, is used in technology-dependant organisations for the executive who is accountable for the management and delivery of business systems, technology and information. 81fc1a9c-4420-4c21-a5dc-982af22a66bf.name: The Role of the Chief Information Officer

badge_template_activities.title: It is the CIO's job to innovate, collaborate, balance the IT budget and motivate IT staff. With this in mind, the ‘Role of the Chief Information Officer’ course is designed to equip you with the tools and knowledge to perform this important new role.

4cc17cc1-7e60-4aeb-a8fb-5c5c9400e035.description: The company secretary is the chief administrative officer of the company and shares various responsibilities with directors under the Companies Act. This is because the associated duties and requirements remain – for example, if there is no company secretary then directors must understand and fulfil responsibilities.
4cc17cc1-7e60-4aeb-a8fb-5c5c9400e035.name: The Role of the Company Secretary

2676c51a-8b86-4165-8024-36ba3ebd28d5.name: The Role of the Executive PA

badge_template_activities.title: The aim of this course is to equip you with the tools and knowledge to perform this responsible role effectively and efficiently. You will learn how to engage with the wider corporate aims of the organisation, ensuring you deliver against organisational goals.

6dfd9177-0426-4790-90a0-0e45951f770a.description: The finance director has overall control and responsibility for all financial aspects of company strategy. They are expected to analyse financial information and implement recommendations based on their findings, achieving the most profitable and positive outcomes. Their expertise means they are often called upon for wider strategic matters and play a pivotal role in the leadership of the business.
6dfd9177-0426-4790-90a0-0e45951f770a.name: The Role of the Finance Director

badge_template_activities.title: This course is designed to equip you with the tools and knowledge to carry out this important and challenging position effectively and efficiently. Through attendance, you will learn how to engage with the wider corporate aims of your organisation, ensuring that linked financial strategies are aligned to those aims.

275ec893-7c97-459b-b410-d4de67d3e576.description: The human resources (HR) director is responsible for overseeing all human resource aspects of a company’s operation. It is a leadership role and central to the development of an organisation’s culture, enabling employees to perform in accordance with set strategic objectives. Effective HR directors can plan, design, develop and evaluate human resource-related initiatives that support organisational strategic goals.
275ec893-7c97-459b-b410-d4de67d3e576.name: The Role of the Human Resources Director

badge_template_activities.title: Our two-day course on the Role of the HR Director is designed to equip you with the tools and knowledge to carry out this important and complex position. You will learn how to engage with the wider corporate aims of your organisation, ensuring that linked HR strategies are aligned to the company’s continuing development.

adc3e3a8-d78a-4cde-aefd-e9c23c02bef5.description: The Role of the Managing Director course is designed to equip you with the tools and knowledge to carry out this crucial and complicated position. Very few managing directors have formal training for the role and are expected to learn on the job.
adc3e3a8-d78a-4cde-aefd-e9c23c02bef5.name: The Role of the Managing Director

badge_template_activities.title: This course will cover not just the key skill sets of the managing director, but also the key mindsets and practices for excellence, and how the role is evolving more than ever. Attendance at The Role of the Managing Director programme will help you in becoming a future leader. It will arm participants with the knowledge and practical skills required for developing, implementing and proactively leading and managing a successful organisation.

872727d3-bfde-4473-9432-f2b2a52a5df2.description: Marketing directors are responsible for their organisation’s marketing and communications strategies and activities, as well as overall branding and image. The marketing director is one of the most important roles in an organisation, often reporting directly to the chief executive, and they are usually board members.
872727d3-bfde-4473-9432-f2b2a52a5df2.name: The Role of the Marketing Director

badge_template_activities.title: Marketing directors should be experienced in setting up successful marketing strategies, vital for engaging the right customers with products or services. Every sector is different, so a marketing director should devise a bespoke strategy for each business they work in. Our ‘Role of the Marketing Director’ course is designed to equip you with the tools and knowledge to carry out this critical and complex position.

90eb1ee6-db6b-49d1-9579-fbef1dea2d2f.description: A non-executive director (NED) is a member of the board of directors. Under company law, there is no legal distinction between executive directors and non-executive directors. Both have the same legal duties, responsibilities and potential liabilities but NEDs do not take part in the executive management of a business, usually standing back from its day-to-day running.
90eb1ee6-db6b-49d1-9579-fbef1dea2d2f.name: The Role of the Non Executive Director

badge_template_activities.title: The governance structure of a business determines responsibilities and levels of authority within it and specifies the rules and procedures for making decisions. NEDs are the custodians of corporate governance and are crucial in ensuring an organisation is run properly. Our two-day course on the Role of the Non-Executive Director is designed to equip you with the tools and knowledge to carry out this critical and complex position effectively. a9292cda-a22e-4b6e-89b0-13c336de358e.description: The Trustee Development in Multi Academy Trusts Programme provides the essential framework necessary to better understand all strategic aspects of leading within a Multi Academy Trust. This intensive Five day Programme will help participants to differentiate between the operational and strategic responsibilities of leadership and develop core professional skills to direct significant decisions within a complex and fast changing landscape.
a9292cda-a22e-4b6e-89b0-13c336de358e.name: Trustee Development in Multi Academy Trusts Programme

badge_template_activities.title: Leaders of Multi Academy Trusts need to ensure that their stewardship and governance should focus on improving education standards. This requires leaders to have the right skill sets combined with the right mindset. It requires the ability to upskill and upscale the infrastructure, mindset, processes and systems of the Trust. 39697d18-1dc7-4922-a682-f12164554bd1.description: The one day Understanding Resilience course will introduce cutting edge theory and practical application relating to how individuals, teams and organisations develop the resilience required to successfully navigate challenging circumstances and environments. We will identify the risks associated with operating in uncertainty, and the predictable human response to change and ambiguity.
39697d18-1dc7-4922-a682-f12164554bd1.name: Understanding Resilience

badge_template_activities.title: This course is one of our Essential Business Toolkit Series. The course can be taken on its own or as part of the series. By attending this course, you will gain invaluable insights from industry experts in to new ways of working, innovative concepts and the latest theories that can be applied instantly on returning to your own organisation.
